# ZLib
add_library(zlib STATIC    	zlib/adler32.c
							zlib/compress.c
							zlib/crc32.c
							zlib/deflate.c
							zlib/gzclose.c
							zlib/gzlib.c
							zlib/gzread.c
							zlib/gzwrite.c
							zlib/infback.c
							zlib/inffast.c
							zlib/inflate.c
							zlib/inftrees.c
							zlib/trees.c
							zlib/uncompr.c
							zlib/zutil.c)
